    Orbitist for Business

    Whether you run an architectural firm or a fashion company, you need to tell your stories to the world. Orbitist lets you generate maps that tell the story of your business.

  • Impress clients with a map of your past projects, embedded on your website or shared on your social media.
  • Showcase your factories or locations.
  • Give customers a sense of all the good work you're doing across the globe!

    • SIGN UP

    Orbitist for Education

    Students are learning in more visual ways. Orbitist is a simple way to bring visual and collaborative learning into the classroom with maps.

  • Create beautiful maps to use as visual lesson aids.
  • Assign maps to students and let them collaborate to explore the world!
  • Flip the classroom! Map your lesson and have students explore the content at home.

    • SIGN UP

    Orbitist for Journalism

    Orbitist was created first and foremost as a simple way to tell stories on beautiful maps. We believe that maps give context to important information â€“ making it really accessible and relevant.

  • Embed maps into your posts.
  • Crowd-source images, tweets and videos that add on-the-ground perspectives to your stories.
  • Put rich multimedia on top of mapped data visualizations using your favorite geospatial tools.

  • Provide your visitors with self-guided tours and maps that help them plan their trip.
  • Create beautiful map kiosks in your museum.
